name: 梁曉帆
objective: 人因工程旨在研究調查人類的能力、限制、行為和其他特性等知識，而應用於工具、設備、系統、任務、工作和環境等的設計，以提高人類生活品質及生產力。所探討的內容可歸納如下：人因工程的研究方法、人體設計、人員的感覺歷程、人員的資訊處理、人員的體力活動、人機介面設計、作業環境、安全與衛生等。
schedule:
Week 01: Introduction and Methods (1, 2/梁)
Week 02: Perception and Cognition (3/梁)
Week 03: Perception and Cognition (3/梁)
Week 04: Perception and Cognition (3/梁)
Week 05: Display (4/梁)
Week 06: Control (10, 11/梁)
Week 07: Control (10, 11/梁)
Week 08: Human Errors and system design (20, 22/梁)
Week 09: Midterm / 期中考
Week 10: Introduction (1/陳)
Week 11: Visual Displays of Dyn. Info. (5/陳)
Week 12: Auditory & Tactual Displays(6/陳)
Week 13: Physical Work & MMH (8/陳)
Week 14: Physical Work & MMH (8/陳)
Week 15: Quiz; Motor Skills (9/陳)
Week 16: Applied Anthropometry (13/陳)
Week 17: Hand Tools & Devices (12/陳)
Week 18: Final / 期末考
materials: Human Factors in Engineering & Design, by Sanders et al., 導讀：王明揚等(滄海圖書)
